participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Curious and introspective, Emily enjoys exploring new ideas and learning from different perspectives.
participant_1.background: my favorite kind of movie is a documentary. i read a book every week. i started a new job as a pa three months ago. i live with my husband in pennsylvania.

participant_2.name: Michael Thompson
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and supportive, Michael is passionate about helping others and advocates for a healthy lifestyle.
participant_2.background: i am a cancer survivor. my parents were both very athletic. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i am a clean eater.
